A heartbreaking triumph.

BLACK BOX DIARIES is a daring & courageous feat of investigative journalism by Shiori Itō, looking into her own experience of sexual assault & the tenacious quest for truth within Japan's corrupt & archaic legal system. This profoundly personal account unfolds with gripping power, utilizing journal entries, riveting & infuriating twists, all presented in chronological order over several years to highlight the taxing toll this all took on her. But, as a result, her resilience shines through and it’s inspiring to witness. A harrowing but important & impactful film.
